page.title: 05WALSHAMS - WALTHAM ABBEY.
page.content: On the 22nd of June a group from 4R interviewed Mr and Mrs Jupp, who own Walshams{Craft Shop.}The shop is in {Sun Street,}the main shopping street in Waltham Abbey. The shop is very old - just over 200 years old. Previously, when Mrs Jupp's father owned it, it used to be a{sweet shop. Mr and Mrs Jupp changed it to a craft shop because there were a lot of other sweet shops in the area. At the back of the shop there is now a video shop, it used to be a stable where Mrs Jupp's father kept a horse and cart. Mrs Jupp said that the town had changed a lot in the last 20 years. In particular the amount of traffic had increased, although it was now fairly peaceful outside the shop, because Sun Street has been{pedestrianised.
